attributes.action: make illegal the use of pre-recorded sales telephone calls and cold calling by telephone. Also to limit sales literature through the post to situations where the potential customer has initiated the enquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban automated sales calls to private homes.
Also  severely restrict the use of sales literature through the post (junk mail), in order to save the environment (paper use, vehicle use for delivery and subsequent collection of rubbish).
The potential customer must initiate the enquiry before sales literature can be posted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
